my basic assumptions just stopped

direction
I stopped shaving I couldn't get out of

and let's use a very big piece of paper

and we printed out the network and
looked at it and that's where we made
our most important discovery that this
complicated network is just made of a
handful of simple repeating interaction
patterns like motifs in a stained glass

they're the elementary circuits that
help us understand the logic of the way

including our body soon enough after

science will eventually become more and

it's not by chance it's a matter of
